content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest in renting my apartment, Emilia. I'm glad you're here to discuss the rental price. I'm open to negotiating, but I want to make sure we both have a clear understanding of what is expected. May I ask how long you plan to stay in the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I'll stay for 1 year. Thanks for asking.

I'm willing to pay 400 euros per month. Is this an acceptable price for you?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, Emilia. While I appreciate your willingness to pay 400 euros per month, I'm afraid that is not an acceptable price for me. I'm looking to maximize my gains, and I believe that 400 euros per month is not enough to cover my expenses. I would be open to negotiating further, but I'm afraid I cannot accept your current offer.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand. I'm willing to negotiate. How much are you looking for?

Also, I want to make sure you are aware that I am a student, so I don't have a lot of income. I do plan to have a part-time job while living in Munich, but I don't want to overcommit myself.

I'm hoping we can find a reasonable compromise that works for both of us.

Please let me know what you require.

Thank you for your time.

Sincerely,
Emilia Müller
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your understanding, Emilia. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and I'm glad to hear that you have a part-time job planned while living in Munich. Based on my expenses, I'm looking for a rental price of around 500 euros per month. I understand that you may not be able to afford this, but I'm hopeful that we can find a compromise that works for both of us. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
